select bc.* from (SELECT DISTINCT document.*, menu.name as step_menu_name, bp.project_name project_name, bp.project_type project_type FROM biz_project_expansion_document document LEFT JOIN biz_project bp on bp.id = document.project_id LEFT JOIN biz_project_step_expansion_menu menu on menu.id = document.step_menu_id where document.deleted=0 ) bc
where 1=1
